sense.def:
To yell
pomeni glasno vpiti, navadno zato, ker smo razburjeni, jezni ali ker nas boli.

seg.quote: I yelled at Richard to hang on.
‘Speed up!’ he yelled to the driver.

sense.def:
A yell
je glasno vpitje nekoga, ki čuti strah ali bolečino.

seg.quote: I heard a yell from inside the house.
